source.name: Understanding Block Explorers
source.instructions: Which of the following statements best describes the function of a block explorer?

answers.answer: It is a tool that allows users to mine new blocks on a blockchain
It is a web application that enables users to view and search blockchain data in real-time
It is a software that manages cryptocurrency wallets and transactions
It is a platform for creating and deploying smart contracts
It is a consensus mechanism used to validate blockchain transactions

source.guidance: The correct answer is that a block explorer is a web application that enables users to view and search blockchain data in real-time. This accurately reflects the definition provided in the topic, which states that a block explorer is an online tool or web application allowing users to view, search, and track information on a blockchain. It serves as a "window" into the blockchain, providing access to details about transactions, blocks, addresses, and other relevant data. The other options are incorrect as they describe different blockchain-related concepts or tools, not the specific function of a block explorer.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT explain the purpose and functionality of block explorers in blockchain technology
